medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started today at 0200 am, waking the patient from sleep. The pain is described as sharp and constant, covering the entire abdomen without focal tenderness. The patient reports a small amount of diarrhea without blood. Symptoms have not improved with an unclear medication. There has been no history of similar pain before. Last meal was yesterday.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past surgical history includes two cesarean sections; all other past medical history is denied.
